title: Is it possible to disable Google Pixel 3 XL suggestions or tips at the top of the certain apps?
content: I've been trying to find a setting to turn off tips/suggestions on the top of certain Google apps on my Pixel 3 XL. These "tips" are breaking the user experience for me but I can't find a way to deactivate them. Please see the examples that I've attached.
